name: Magnetic Mayhem!
description:
Magnetic Mayhem! is a single player puzzle rage game, where you must get the 2 ends of the magnet together. Avoid electro magnetic fields, and maneuver around obstacles and stationary magnets.

Made for GMTK 2021: Joined Together. The game and all it's assets were made in the 48 hours.

Made by CodeHacher123(on YT), SMX(on YT), pastordisaster(on YT), and skiwee. If you enjoyed playing consider checking out and subscribing to Ice Pops on YT, where skiwee and CodeHacher123 collaborate to make awesome game dev videos.
